name: simple-jekyll-search
description: Simple Jekyll site search using javascript and json

scripts.browserify: browserify -p browser-pack-flat/plugin src/index.js | node scripts/stamp.js > dest/simple-jekyll-search.js
scripts.build: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run copy-example-code
